recipe.name: Spice-Rubbed Chicken
recipe.notes: A tasty from my modern version of "The Joy Of Cooking".  The rub works pretty well on pork tenderloin as  well.
recipe.preparation: Mix together salt, mustard fennel, coriander, cinnamon and red pepper; crushing in the fennel seeds in a mortar & pestle or against the side of the bowl with a strong metal spoon. Rinse and pat dry chicken breasts and evenly coat all sides with spice mixture.Grill chicken and prepare sauce:  mix olive oil, cilantro, lemon juice, garlic and a dash of salt in a small bowl.  Drizzle oil mixture over chicken just prior to serving.Olive oil mix may be made ahead of time and chilled -- the difference in temperatures between the oil and the chicken is rather pleasant.
